== Private Github Repository 

. https://gist.githubusercontent.com/bob-193/f0fe97c23c507bc2c29a087e1d7682d0/raw/38934eddc8b2ff00f781988a1d2f3c8e1b1fccb7/email.md[]


----
$ echo '' | base64 -d > bob.zip
$ unzip bob.zip
$ eval (ssh-agent -c)
$ ssh-add id_rsa 
@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
@         WARNING: UNPROTECTED PRIVATE KEY FILE!          @
@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
Permissions 0644 for 'id_rsa' are too open.
It is required that your private key files are NOT accessible by others.
This private key will be ignored.
$ chmod 600 id_rsa
$ ssh-add id_rsa

$ git init
$ git remote add origin git@github.com:bob-193/1337up.git
$ ssh -T git@github.com

$ git pull origin main

== Cold Storage

----
$ unzip cryptovault.apk
$ cd assets/www
$ rm -r cordova.js cordova_plugins.js plugins/
----

. find ``return _0x351569[_0x588caa(0x11a)]`` in ``js/keygen.js``
. add ``console.log(_0x22e526);`` before it
. open website ``firefox index.html``
. type password ``7331``
. web dev tools -> copy ``494e544947524954497b35305f6d7563685f6630725f3533637572335f63306c645f353730723436337d``
. convert from hex to string ``INTIGRITI\{hah}``


== Logging

[, python]
----
import re

pattern = r"!%3DCHAR\((\d+)\)"
with open('./app.log', 'r') as file:
    logs = file.read()
    

matches = re.findall(pattern, logs)

print("Matched numbers:", matches)

text = ""
for ascii_dec in matches:
    dec = int(ascii_dec)
    text += chr(dec)
print(text)
----
